sentences.sentence: BEHIND curlicues of cigarette smoke and with the gentle tones of wartime tunes wafting from a tape deck, Alf Biber is back on his feet after the looting of his dinky Tottenham barbershop (above).
sentences.translation: 在伦敦·托特纳姆区一家小巧精致的男士理发店里烟圈缭绕，放音机里飘来战时音乐温柔的调子。埃尔夫•拜博的这家小店在被打劫之后又重回正轨(见上图)。
